questions.question_text: Deleted records will be stored in the Recycle Bin for up to 15 days.

discussion.content: A. True! You can search for the Recycle bin from the App launcher. Unless you've hard deleted your data, you can restore recently deleted records for 15 days before they are permanently deleted from the recycle bin. If your organization reaches its Recycle Bin limit, Salesforce automatically removes the oldest records if they have been in the Recycle Bin for at least two hours.

questions.question_text: Which report format provides a tabular listing of data with sorting and subtotalling of said data.

discussion.content: Summary - Displays a list of records sorted into groups with subtotals; Matrix - Summarizes data in a grid to compare related totals; Joined - Displays multiple blocks of data in a single report.
